alert.note: Alert for Garland (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued October 15 at 6:58PM CDT until October 15 at 11:00PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 730 PM CDT FOR EAST CENTRAL GARLAND AND SOUTH CENTRAL SALINE COUNTIES... At 658 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Lonsdale, or 7 miles west of Benton, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Two inch hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Benton... Bryant... Haskell... Traskwood... Lonsdale... Salem in Saline County... Alexander... Bauxite... Nance... Congo... Grape... Bland... Crows... THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. This storm is producing large hail. SEEK SHELTER NOW inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows. This is a dangerous storm. Prepare immediately for large destructive hail capable of producing significant damage. People outside should move to a shelter, inside a strong building and away from windows.
